```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)

expense <- read_csv(here("day_01", "aoc_01.txt"), col_names = "fee1")
```

### Part 1

```{r}
expense %>%
  crossing(fee2 = .$fee1) %>%
  filter(fee1 + fee2 == 2020) %>%
  mutate(product = fee1 * fee2)
```

### Part 2

```{r}
expense %>%
  crossing(fee2 = .$fee1) %>%
  crossing(fee3 = .$fee1) %>%
  filter(fee1 + fee2 + fee3 == 2020) %>%
  mutate(product = fee1 * fee2 * fee3)
```
